data.name: Combo Card Clashers
data.detailed_description:
Join Our Discord Community!


About the Game

A New Way to Play


Rogue Combo Heroes brings a groundbreaking fresh new combat system to roguelike deck building games. Place your cards in the rows and columns of the combo grid to unleash powerful synergy.

Explore the World


Travel the world, and recruit monsters and mercenaries to fight with you. Encounter events, buy new spells, weapons, gear and make strategic decisions.

Unique Heroes


Three heroes to choose (and more to come), each has its own unique and surprising gameplay. Customize the attributes of each hero, and edit their starting decks to maximize their potential. Level up, gain attributes, equip gear, upgrade cards and find artifacts to open up new roads to victory.



Each run is unique!
  • Over 100 cards
  • 3 unique heroes with customizable attributes (more heroes in future releases!)
  • Build your own starting deck!
  • Travel randomly generated landscapes
  • Buy new cards, and randomly generated gear
  • Recruit monsters, and hire allies
  • More than 20 unique random events
  • Ascension levels
  • And more to come!
